## TaxCalculationMode enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum TaxCalculationMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  LineItemLevel | <code>&quot;LineItemLevel&quot;</code> | Default. This calculation mode calculates the taxes after the unit price is multiplied with the quantity. E.g. <code>($1.08 * 3 = $3.24) * 1.19 = $3.8556 -&gt; $3.86 rounded</code> |
|  UnitPriceLevel | <code>&quot;UnitPriceLevel&quot;</code> | This calculation mode calculates the taxes on the unit price before multiplying with the quantity. E.g. <code>($1.08 * 1.19 = $1.2852 -&gt; $1.29 rounded) * 3 = $3.87</code> |
